The following tasks were created:

Task 1
Short description: Create & Upload Curated Report to include “Neo User Roles and Security Values - Detailed”
Assigned to: IT - Oracle ERP


Task 2
Short description: Create & Upload Curated Report to include “Neo User Roles and Security Values - Detailed” Report and added columns.
Assigned to: IT - Oracle ERP


NOTE:
Emails cannot be sent to individuals from the development environment. This Teams channel will be used for sending ServiceNow notifications.
